Traces is an experiment in multiple user interaction, WebGL 2 and Socket.IO.


Six users at a time can interact with the particle system. As you interact your influence will be seen by other users, and you can see theirs.


Left-Click to repel, Shift-Click or Middle-Click to attract.


More information about the project and some further WebGL experiments can be seen here.
